title: Friedell, Marks, and Lopez
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Nick Friedell about Nets media day and Brooklyn's outlook. Then (37:10) ESPN's Bobby Marks talks Jae Crowder and the Suns, and (55:30) ESPN's Andrew Lopez previews the Pelicans. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
